#IndiaFightsCorona: Are steroids advisable in mild #COVID19 cases Taking high dose steroids in mild cases may lead to severe viral pneumonia. Steroids should be taken in moderate illness. It may be harmful if taken in initial 5 days of mild illness: Dr. Guleria, AIIMS https://t.co/MbLRSFUIby

#IndiaFightsCorona Is CT scan required in mild #COVID19 cases If you are asymptomatic, have mild illness oxygen saturation is normal, there is no need of a #CTScan CT scan is required only if you have moderate illness: Dr. Randeep Guleria, Director, AIIMS #StaySafe https://t.co/J3p9T9pL4B

#IndiaFightsCorona: Some important FAQs on #AYUSH64 What guidelines/precautions should I follow while taking Ayush-64 There are no such special precautions to be followed while using Ayush-64. #Unite2FightCorona #StaySafe https://t.co/45QmyJzrnl

#IndiaFightsCorona: Some important FAQs on #AYUSH64 Is Ayush-64 safe for pregnant lactating women The safety of Ayush-64 in cases of pregnant lactating women is not established through scientific studies. #Unite2FightCorona #StaySafe https://t.co/IsrO9bslQV

#IndiaFightsCorona: Some important FAQs on #AYUSH64 Is Ayush-64 safe if taken after vaccination Yes. If a person gets infected even after vaccination, Ayush-64 can be taken within 7 days of testing RT-PCR positive for SARS CoV-2. #Unite2FightCorona #StaySafe https://t.co/yb3H2RHOwQ

#IndiaFightsCorona: Some important FAQs on #AYUSH64 Can a #COVID19 patient with other co-morbidities take Ayush-64 Patients with co-morbidities like hypertension diabetes can take Ayush-64 for asymptomatic, mild to moderate disease #Unite2FightCorona #StaySafe https://t.co/A5BGcWD10Z

#IndiaFightsCorona: Some important FAQs on #AYUSH64 Should Ayush-64 be taken as standalone treatment in mild cases It can be taken as a standalone treatment in mild cases under supervision of an Ayurvedic physician. #Unite2FightCorona #StaySafe https://t.co/dQdbI9GPWo

#IndiaFightsCorona: Some important FAQs on #AYUSH64 What is the ideal dose for Ayush-64 in #COVID19 patients The dose for asymptomatic COVID-19 case is 2 tablets of 500mg, twice daily, one hour after meals with warm water for 14 days. #Unite2FightCorona #StaySafe https://t.co/ojRCMd0R53

#IndiaFightsCorona: Some important FAQs on #AYUSH64 Who can take Ayush-64 Patients of mild to moderate #COVID19 cases showing initial symptoms and asymptomatic cases of COVID-19 can start taking Ayush-64 within 7 days of diagnosis. #Unite2FightCorona #StaySafe https://t.co/p6QqDh2yL3
#IndiaFightsCorona: Some important FAQs on #AYUSH64 What is Ayush-64 Ayush-64 is an Ayurvedic formulation developed the @CCRAS_MoAYUSH. #Unite2FightCorona #StaySafe https://t.co/QophAbjJJ1
